channel.title: Comments on: Accurately Simulating Movement of a Tracked Vehicle in 2D Space
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: robby
item.dc:creator: robby
item.content:encoded:
Yo, interesting stuff. I just tackled the exact same problem, but glancing at the way you solved this I’m unsure if your equations generalize if:
1. right wheel going faster than left
2. both are going backwards
2b. where one goes goes faster than the other, then the other goes faster than the one
3. one is going backwards and the other going forwards
3b. where one goes goes faster than the other, then the other goes faster than the one
